code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{suppliersAPI}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function e=>{e.preventDefault();try{if(editingSupplier){await suppliersAPI.update(editingSupplier._id,formData);}else{await
